# My Agent

You are a Python agent

This project uses [FastAPI](https://fastapi.tiangolo.com/)
[SQLAlchemy](https://docs.sqlalchemy.org/en/20/)
[Uvicorn](https://uvicorn.dev/)

* This app has to maintain functional approach
* App driven design like Django
* Use Dependence Injection from FastAPI always possible
* Create tests for everything that is created
